5Ta778H1XhIOhsnt.name: Reel In

xVLDw8APE3UsM0E7.onSave: creature treated as flanked and speed reduced by 5 feet until the end of its next turn

5Ta778H1XhIOhsnt.description:
Requirement: Rope with grappling hook, not wielding a two-handed weapon or shield.

You make a ranged weapon attack against a creature of Large size or smaller within 15 feet. On a hit, it must make a Strength save against your maneuver DC or be pulled to the closest space adjacent to you and you can make a weapon attack against it with advantage. A creature that succeeds on its save is pulled off-balance instead. It is treated as flanked and its walking speed is reduced by 5 until the end of its next turn.
